name: function 7
function 11
func:
msg.topic = `
SET @today = CURRENT_DATE();
SET @exists = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM log_table WHERE date_log = @today);

UPDATE log_table 
SET 
    normal_pot = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultivationpot WHERE cultivationpot.status = 'safe') + 
                 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM growingpot WHERE growingpot.status = 'safe'),
    unnormal_pot = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultivationpot WHERE cultivationpot.status = 'danger') + 
                   (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM growingpot WHERE growingpot.status = 'danger')
WHERE date_log = @today AND @exists > 0;

INSERT INTO log_table (date_log, normal_pot, unnormal_pot)
SELECT 
    @today,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultivationpot WHERE cultivationpot.status = 'safe') + 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM growingpot WHERE growingpot.status = 'safe'),
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultivationpot WHERE cultivationpot.status = 'danger') + 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM growingpot WHERE growingpot.status = 'danger')
WHERE @exists = 0;

SELECT 
    log_table.log_id, 
    DATE_FORMAT(log_table.date_log, '%d/%m/%Y') AS date_log, 
    log_table.normal_pot,
    log_table.unnormal_pot 
FROM log_table 
WHERE 1 
ORDER BY log_table.log_id DESC 
LIMIT 1;`;
return msg;

name: function 12
function 8
func:
var dv = msg.req.params.deviceid

var sql = `SELECT 
    cultivationpot.cultivation_pot_id AS pot_id, 
    cultivationpot.device_id, 
    cultivationpot.img_path, 
    cultivationpot.status, 
    cultivationpot.age, 
    cultivationpot.farm_id, 
    cultivationpot.pot_name, 
    cultivationpot.index, 
    typepot.type_pot_name, 
    typepot.type_pot_id 
FROM cultivationpot 
JOIN typepot ON cultivationpot.type_pot_id = typepot.type_pot_id 
WHERE cultivationpot.device_id = ${dv}

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    growingpot.growing_pot_id AS pot_id, 
    growingpot.device_id, 
    growingpot.img_path, 
    growingpot.status, 
    growingpot.age, 
    growingpot.farm_id, 
    growingpot.pot_name, 
    growingpot.index, 
    typepot.type_pot_name, 
    typepot.type_pot_id 
FROM growingpot 
JOIN typepot ON growingpot.type_pot_id = typepot.type_pot_id 
WHERE growingpot.device_id = ${dv}`;
msg.topic = sql;

return msg;

name: function 9
func:
msg.topic = `CALL manage_pots(${msg.payload.device} , "${msg.payload.pot_name}" , "${msg.payload.status}" , ${msg.payload.typepot})`;

return msg;

rules.to: SELECT      SUM(CASE WHEN device.status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_count,     SUM(CASE WHEN device.status = 'inactive' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS inactive_count FROM device;
